sentences.en: But, unduly worried by inflation, It'seems unwilling to do even that.
sentences.cn: 但是, 因为对通货膨胀有不必要的担忧, 欧洲央行甚至连这一步也不愿意走.

sentences.en: Caroline Hand was, perhaps, unduly reckless.
sentences.cn: 加罗琳·韩德也许是过于轻率了.

sentences.en: He appealed to firms not to increase their prices unduly.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁企业不要过度提高价格。

sentences.en: He argued that the law was unduly restrictive.
sentences.cn: 他辩称法律的约束性有些过分了.

sentences.en: He did not sound unduly worried at the prospect.
sentences.cn: 他的口气听上去对前景并不十分担忧。

sentences.en: He seemed unduly reticent on the subject of his past.
sentences.cn: 他似乎对他过去的事情讳莫如深.

sentences.en: He was never unduly elated by victory or depressed by defeat.
He was not made unduly curious because of this sudden favor.
sentences.cn: 这次突然得宠,他并不感到特别奇怪.
这事并没有让我太烦恼。

sentences.en: Margaret herself was not unduly bothered.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特自己对此并不十分看重.

sentences.en: Still, I don't want to alarm Jane unduly.
sentences.cn: 我还是不愿意让简过分惊恐.

sentences.en: The law does not meddle unduly with a person's private life.
sentences.cn: 这部法律并不过度干涉他人的私生活.

sentences.en: This attitude seemed to me unduly fussy.
sentences.cn: 在我看来这种态度过于大惊小怪.

sentences.en: This will achieve greater security without unduly burdening the consumers or the economy.
sentences.cn: 此举可提高安全性，而不会给消费者和经济增加过多的负担。

sentences.en: Those things that can be assessed by external tests are being given unduly high status.
sentences.cn: 那些可以通过外部测试来评估的东西被过于重视了。

words.tran_cn: 过度的，过分的；不适当的；未到期的
过度地；不适当地；不正当地

trans.tran_cn: 不适当地，过分地，过度地，不相称地
trans.tran_en: more than is normal or reasonable
